mapper.insert:
insert into bureau_info
bureau_info.bureau_code, bureau_info.bureau_name,
bureau_info.input_code,
bureau_info.is_delete,
bureau_info.operator,
bureau_info.create_time
values
#{bureauCode}, #{bureauName},
#{inputCode},
#{isDelete},
#{operator},
current_timestamp
mapper.update:
update bureau_info
bureau_info.bureau_code = #{BureauCode},
bureau_info.bureau_name = #{BureauName},
bureau_info.input_code = #{InputCode},
bureau_info.is_delete = #{IsDelete},
bureau_info.operator = #{Operator}
bureau_info.update_time= current_timestamp
bureau_info.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select bureau_info.bureau_code, bureau_info.bureau_name, bureau_info.create_time, bureau_info.id, bureau_info.input_code, bureau_info.is_delete, bureau_info.operator, bureau_info.update_time form bureau_info
bureau_info.id = #{id}
